# conveys
<a href="https://github.com/WingedSeal/jmc"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/made%20with-JMC-yellow?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64,"></a>
<!-- JMC is a trademark of WingedSeal https://github.com/WingedSeal/jmc -->  
A data pack that adds conveyor belts and stuff. 

## Build instructions
You likely won't need to build the data pack, as the compiled version comes packed with the source code in this repository.  
For normal use, just drag the downloaded repository into your `datapacks/` folder and type `/reload`.
1. Install JMC as per the instructions available in https://github.com/WingedSeal/jmc.
2. Clone the repository in your `datapacks/` folder.
3. Run and configure JMC in the `jmc/` directory.
   Set the namespace to `coneys`, the Minecraft version to `1.19.2` and the output directory to `..`.
4. After configuring, now run the command `compile`.
5. `/reload` in-game to apply the data pack.
